parameters.name: loc
parameters.description: A pointer to the location that you want to clear bits in.

parameters.name: bits
parameters.description: The bits that you want to clear.

full_content:
Function: atomic_clr
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/atomic_clr.html
Synopsis: void atomic_clr( volatile unsigned * loc,
Headers: #include <atomic.h>
Parameters:
  - loc: A pointer to the location that you want to clear bits in.
  - bits: The bits that you want to clear.
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <atomic.h>

void atomic_clr( volatile unsigned * loc,
                 unsigned bits );
Example 2:
#include <atomic.h>
â¦

volatile unsigned flags;
â¦

atomic_clr( &flags, 0x10101010 );
